short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supports local printing functionality while working in Applied CSR24

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Applied CSR24 is the most technologically advanced customer service software application built for independent insurance agencies to automate business operations and drive connectivity to insureds in the changing insurance marketplace.

To use this extension, you'll need to be signed in to Applied CSR24 and install the Applied CSR24 Desktop Connector. From the Batch Printing popup within Applied CSR24, follow the on-screen instructions to complete this necessary install. Once the desktop connector and extension are installed, you'll have access to enhanced batch printing to local and network printers through Applied CSR24.
